title: Duties of Campus Ambassador
text: Campus Ambassador is the face of Kashiyatra.They Act as a link between Kashiyatra and their college and are the first point of contact for the students .Following are the responsibilities one has to take

section.title: Represent
section.content: Represent and exemplify Kashiyatra in your college among your peers.

section.title: Conceptualize
section.content: Bring forth ideas and propasals as valuable input for team Kashiyatra.

section.title: Organise
section.content: Conduct workshops and promotional event in your college for Kashiyatra.

section.title: Publicize
section.content: Promote Kashiyatra by Publicizing its events through social media Platforms.
